amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress regarding climate change.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 24 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 42. Record Vote Number: 16.
Amendment SA 24 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 2.
